alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:27AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Leake, northern Newton, southwestern Kemper, northeastern Scott, southern Neshoba and northwestern Lauderdale Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 826 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lena, or 8 miles southwest of Carthage, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Walnut Grove, Standing Pine and Tuscola around 835 AM CDT. Sebastopol, Madden and Dowdville around 845 AM CDT. Prospect and Dixon around 850 AM CDT. Union and Neshoba around 855 AM CDT. Stratton and Bethsaida around 900 AM CDT. Little Rock and House around 905 AM CDT. Collinsville, Herbert Springs and Duffee around 910 AM CDT. Martin and Suqualena around 915 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kemper; Lauderdale; Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Scott
